short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Does it's best to find and conceal sensitive Azure information found in the portal views

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a Chrome extension that will mask GUIDs (such as Subscription IDs) and email addresses with a blur. The intention of the extension is to make it easier to do screen recordings without revealing sensitive, personal, account information that may show up on screen. It will only run and apply against Azure related URLs.
